trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> is placed on every control and is sized to the exact bounds of each control.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> est placé sur chaque contrôle et la taille est calquée sur les limites exactes de chaque contrôle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> qui représente les limites du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> qui représente le curseur à afficher quand le pointeur de la souris se trouve sur le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The component with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> qui représente les limites du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> qui représente le curseur à afficher quand le pointeur de la souris se trouve sur le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The component with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner" /> with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.target: Point auquel appliquer un test de positionnement.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Indique si le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" /> doit gérer un clic de souris à l'emplacement spécifié.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated with <paramref name="p" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> si le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> est associé au <paramref name="p" /> ; sinon, <see langword="null" />.
